name: OFF: Purifier's Halloween
description:
A short halloween themed OFF fan game where The Batter and The Judge go trick or treating.

Features:

  • Getting candy!
  • Pablo following you!
  • Familiar characters in costumes!
  • Cameos!
  • Houses haunted by spectres!
  • Halloween Harassment!
  • Dedan saying slurs!

Have fun!
